entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:26PM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Randolph, central Pocahontas and southeastern Webster Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 525 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Webster Springs, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Northwest Pocahontas; Northwest Webster; Southeast Pocahontas; Southeast Randolph; Southeast Webster
